text: Grinnin' Records is a British independent record label, founded by Andrew Kwame Asamoah, former A&R; Manager at RCA Records, Sony Music. In addition to the label, Grinnin' Records works in partnership with Vocal Management company. Both are primarily focused on urban music genres. ==Artists== ===Current=== *Shaheen Jafargholi *Gracious K *Kelly Pepper ===Past=== ==References== Category:British hip hop record labels Category:British independent record labels Category:Contemporary R&B; record labels Category:Drum and bass record labels
title: Grinnin' Records
